column4: hello all, 've just reached the end of the "man ssh" page in the console... How do I break out of it and get back to the command line? I am pressing Ctrl+C but nothing s happening
okay well that gives you a job number.  So if you want it in the foreground: fg %1.  Background: bg %1.  where 1 is the job number
not sure how job numbers work out :P
k, you could probably use ALT+F2 to run it too
I like running it from the terminal :) Major thanks though, I didn't know about ^Z... Thanks (That's suspend?) !
yep, google for "job control bash"  you'll learna ll about bg and fg... you can stop by using kill %1 too
I got a sweet document on bash control... your google term struck gold :)
yeah, am doing that now, but don't like it... Maybe there is something else I can use?
how about the 0 that xspades suggested?
numbers and letters work... was just trying to use a symbol instead... It's a quirk I have :P
might have better luck in #ubuntu+1 with dapper questions
